title: Big philanthropy’s transparency problem
description:
Billionaires say they gave a lot of money in 2020. Recode’s Teddy Schleifer argues that they should be more transparent about how.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:title: Big philanthropy’s transparency problem
itunes:author: Recode
itunes:subtitle: By one estimate, the 50 largest donors gave away 25 billion dollars overall.
